      public GameSaver()

  • Method Details

    • clearFile

      public static void clearFile()
      Clears the current save file by creating a new buffered writer. If the file already exists, its contents are truncated. Any exception during this operation is printed to the stack trace.

    • saveTutorialGame

      public static void saveTutorialGame(Game game)
      Saves the identifier for a tutorial game and its starting data to the save file.
      Parameters:
      game - the tutorial game instance to save

    • saveLevel2Game

      public static void saveLevel2Game(Game game)
      Saves the identifier for a level 2 game, its starting data, and the serialized card piles to the save file.
      Parameters:
      game - the level 2 game instance to save

    • savePlaceAstronauts

      public static void savePlaceAstronauts(String nickname, int i, int j)
      Saves the "placeAstronauts" command with the specified parameters to the save file.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player performing the action
      i - the row index
      j - the column index

    • savePlaceBrownAlien

      public static void savePlaceBrownAlien(String nickname, int i, int j)
      Saves the "placeBrownAlien" command with the specified coordinates for the given player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player placing the purple alien
      i - the row index on the ship grid
      j - the column index on the ship grid

    • savePlacePurpleAlien

      public static void savePlacePurpleAlien(String nickname, int i, int j)
      Saves the "placePurpleAlien" command with the specified coordinates for the given player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player placing the purple alien
      i - the row index on the ship grid
      j - the column index on the ship grid

    • savePickCoveredTile

      public static void savePickCoveredTile(String nickname)
      Saves the "pickCoveredTile" command for the given player to the save file.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player performing the action

    • savePickUncoveredTile

      public static void savePickUncoveredTile(String nickname, String tilePngName)
      Saves the "pickUncoveredTile" command for the specified player, indicating that they selected a visible component tile.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player picking the tile
      tilePngName - the PNG name of the chosen tile

    • saveRotateClockwise

      public static void saveRotateClockwise(String nickname)
      Saves the "rotateClockwise" command for the specified player, indicating that they rotated the currently held tile clockwise.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player performing the rotation

    • saveRotateCounterClockwise

      public static void saveRotateCounterClockwise(String nickname)
      Saves the "rotateCounterClockwise" command for the specified player, indicating that they rotated the currently held tile counterclockwise.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player performing the rotation

    • saveWeldComponentTile

      public static void saveWeldComponentTile(String nickname, int i, int j)
      Saves the "weldComponentTile" command for the specified player, indicating that they placed the tile at the given coordinates on their ship.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player placing the tile
      i - the row index on the ship grid
      j - the column index on the ship grid

    • saveStandbyComponentTile

      public static void saveStandbyComponentTile(String nickname)
      Saves the "standbyComponentTile" command for the specified player, indicating that they set aside the currently held tile into standby mode.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player putting the tile on standby

    • savePickStandByComponentTile

      public static void savePickStandByComponentTile(String nickname, int index)
      Saves the "pickStandByComponentTile" command for the specified player, indicating that they picked a tile from their standby list.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player picking the tile
      index - the index of the tile in the standby list

    • saveDiscardComponentTile

      public static void saveDiscardComponentTile(String nickname)
      Saves the "discardComponentTile" command for the specified player, indicating that they discarded the currently held tile.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player discarding the tile

    • saveFinishBuilding

      public static void saveFinishBuilding(String nickname, int pos)
      Saves the "finishBuilding" command for the specified player, indicating that they completed the ship building phase.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player finishing their ship
      pos - the player's position in the order of completion

    • saveFlipHourglass

      public static void saveFlipHourglass()
      Saves the "flipHourglass" command, indicating that the hourglass was flipped during the building phase.

    • savePickCard

      public static void savePickCard()
      Saves the "pickCard" command, indicating that a new adventure card was drawn.

    • savePlayerAbandons

      public static void savePlayerAbandons(String nickname)
      Saves the "playerAbandons" command for the specified player, indicating that the player abandoned the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player who abandoned the game

    • saveDestroyTile

      public static void saveDestroyTile(String nickname, int i, int j)
      Saves the "destroyTile" command for the specified player, indicating that a tile was destroyed on their ship at the given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the affected player
      i - the row index of the destroyed tile
      j - the column index of the destroyed tile

    • saveActivateCard

      public static void saveActivateCard(InputCommand inputCommand)
      Saves the "activateCard" command, indicating that an adventure card was activated with the given input.
      Parameters:
      inputCommand - the input used to activate the card

    • loadGame

      public static Game loadGame()
      Loads a previously saved game from the save file. It reads the game type (e.g., "tutorial", "level2"), reconstructs the corresponding Game object with its initial state (players, deck, covered tiles, etc.), and then applies all saved commands to bring the game back to its latest state.
      Returns:
      the reconstructed Game instance, or null if an error occurs during loading
